space.arim.api.server

Class ChatUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.arim.api.server.ChatUtil

  • public final class ChatUtil
extends Object
    Utility class for formatting chat messages and parsing colours.
    Accepts uppercase and lowercase chars.

    Notice:
    Some methods are platform dependent! It is recommended to instead use SpigotUtil, BungeeUtil, or SpongeUtil depending on your platform.

    Colour Parsing:
    * Parses '&' colour codes.
    * Spigot usage: colour(String).
    * BungeeCord usage: colourBungee(String).
    * Sponge usage: colourSponge(String).
    * Removing colour: stripColour(String).
    * Converting from '§' colour codes: replaceColour(String).
    * A string is considered colored when it uses '§' color codes.

    Json Messages:
    * Parses json based on RezzedUp's json.sk format
    * Includes colour parsing.
    * Usage: parseJson(String) or parseJsonSponge(String).
    * Removing formatting: stripJson(String)
    Author:
    A248

        public static String replaceColour(String coloured)
        Replaces valid '§' colour codes.
        Parameters:
        coloured - the input string
        Returns:
        the same string with '&' colour codes instead

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        an uncoloured string

      • colour

        public static String colour(String colourable)
        Adds colour to a message.
        The input uses '&' colour codes.
        The result uses '§' colour codes.
        Parameters:
        colourable - the string to add colour to
        Returns:
        the coloured string

      • stripJson

        public static String stripJson(String json)
        Removes all Json message formatting
        Parameters:
        json - the input string
        Returns:
        a string stripped of all json tags

      • parseJson

        public static net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[] parseJson(String jsonable)
        Parses Json messages based on RezzedUp's json.sk format.

        The following json tags are parsed: ttp, url, cmd, sgt, and ins.
        Colours are parsed according to '&' colour codes.
        Parameters:
        jsonable - the input string
        Returns:
        a formatted BaseComponent array

      • parseColouredJson

        public static net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[] parseColouredJson(String colouredJsonable)
        Converts a coloured AND formatted string into a BaseComponent array.

        See parseJson(String) Colours are parsed according to '§' colour codes.
        Parameters:
        colouredJsonable - the input string
        Returns:
        a formatted BaseComponent array

      • parseJsonSponge

        public static org.spongepowered.api.text.Text parseJsonSponge(String jsonable)
        Identical in purpose to parseJson(String), but designed for the Sponge API instead.
        Parameters:
        jsonable - the input string
        Returns:
        a formatted Text object
